content: आकीर्ण {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Scattered or spread over. {@--2@} Filled or overspread with, crowded, full of, abounding in; जनाकीर्णं मन्ये हुतवहपरीतं गृहमिव <ls>Ś. 5. 10</ls>; आकीर्णमृषिपत्नीनामुटजद्वाररोधिभिः <ls>R. 1. 50</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 375</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 51.</ls> --र्णं A crowd; <ls>V. 2.</ls>
